mapper.select:
SELECT o.id, o.subscriber, us.name as subscriberName, us.telephone as subscriberPhone, o.module, m.name as moduleName, p.name as project, o.project, p.name as projectName, DATE_FORMAT(o.starttime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as startTime, DATE_FORMAT(o.endtime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as endTime, TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, o.starttime, o.endtime) / 3600.0 as duration, o.vehicleId, o.vehicleNo, o.`load`, l.name as loadName, o.address, o.purpose, o.route, o.subscribeNote, o.inclinationDriver, ui.name as inclinationDriverName, o.approver, ua.name as approverName, o.comment, o.driver, ud.name as driverName, ud.telephone as driverPhone, o.state, s.name as stateName, DATE_FORMAT(o.updatetime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as updateTime FROM v_order o LEFT JOIN v_project p ON o.project = p.id LEFT JOIN v_module m ON o.module = m.id LEFT JOIN v_load l ON o.`load` = l.id LEFT JOIN v_user us on o.subscriber = us.id LEFT JOIN v_user ua on o.approver = ua.id LEFT JOIN v_user ui on o.inclinationDriver = ui.id LEFT JOIN v_user ud on o.driver = ud.id LEFT JOIN v_order_state s on o.state = s.id
o.vehicleno LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query.blurry}, '%') OR l.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query.blurry}, '%') OR p.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query.blurry}, '%') OR m.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query.blurry}, '%') OR o.starttime LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query.blurry}, '%') OR o.endtime LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query.blurry}, '%') OR o.address LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query.blurry}, '%') OR us.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query.blurry}, '%') OR ud.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query.blurry}, '%')
ORDER BY o.${query.sort} ${query.order}
ORDER BY o.id DESC
